name: updateEntity
description: Update an entity's details by accepting input specifying one or more updated attributesâ€”such as name, primary image, or module. If changing the module, specify whether to copy or move the entity.

entityId.description: The unique identifier of the entity to update.

moduleId.description: The unique identifier of the module to update.

primaryImageId.description: The unique identifier of the image to set as primary.

newName.description: Optional new name for the entity.

newModuleId.description: Optional new module ID to move the entity to a different module.

moduleChangeMethod.description: The method to use when changing the module. 'copy' will duplicate the entity in the new module, while 'move' will transfer it.

explainer.description: Explain what action is going to be taken in a human readable sentence. Examples: 'Renaming the entity from Sunset to Sunset Beach', 'Setting a new primary image for the entity Sunset Beach', 'Moving the entity Sunset Beach to a new module'.
